name: deep-thoughts
description: A social media application where users can create an account, post their thoughts for others to see, and interact with other users through these thoughts

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: dcharney
